name: Mr. Roboto
description:
Welcome to Mr. Roboto and his ambition to build the biggest and fastest super-computer of the whole, wide world. You are one of his minions and will help him achieve this goal.

This is basically a clicker-/idle-game where you generate flops by buying hardware- and software-upgrades, resetting your state, gaining bonuses and much more.

Developer: This is my first released game made with the Unity-Game-Engine and I really hope you have fun and feel entertained by it. It was made 2019 during a period of almost half a year in my spare-time.

During this development a few investments had to be made for stock-images and plugins, so if you have tried the game and did like it, a small donation via itch.io would be awesome.
